EmailTemplate.name: AR Application Rejected at Initial Review
EmailTemplate.subject: {!ar_Application__c.Company_Name__c} application is rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ar_Application__c.First_Name__c}
Thank you for applying to become one of Unilever’s preferred creative partners.
Unfortunately, in this instance your submission has not been successful.
Should you feel your situation has changed, we would encourage you to apply again in a year’s time.
With Kindest Regards,
Dennis Furniss
